page.title: 10 MY SCHOOL DAY
page.content: My school day starts when I get up in the morning about 7.25.I have to make my own bed, then after that I get a wash then I get dressed and comb my hair.Then I get my breakfast, get my school bag ready with all my school equipment in it. Then I go to school when I arrive at school we have registration and then we go down to assembly. After assembly we have two lessons and then we have playtime and after that we have two more lessons followed by dinnertime. Then after dinnertime we have two more lessons, followed by another playtimeand then finally the last two lessons of the day we usually leave at 4 o'clock unless we have a practice of some sort. By Michael Ingham(12)
